title: Hybrid Wars Deluxe Edition WORKING CO-OP, 3 CHARS, BONUS CONTENT
description:
Game Features:

Discover multiple game modes 
Dive into up to 15 hours of gameplay 
Explore and conquer 8 huge, open-worlds 
Overcome 150 challenging objectives 
Earn 40+ rewards 
Wield 2 diverse heroes 
Command 4 dynamic types of vehicles: tanks, robots, helicopters, titans 
Defeat 50+ types of enemies 
Vanquish 8 powerful bosses 
Lock and load with 20 types of weapon 
Harness 28 additional abilities for each hero and vehicle type 

Repack Features:

Based on Hybrid.Wars-RELOADED ISO release: rld-hywa.iso (5,436,276,736 bytes) 
GOG bonus content (Artbook, OST, wallpapers - total 554 MB) added 
All 3 currently available chars activated, for using Ivan you must register in-game 
Multiplayer is also available after in-game login, exiting MP menu and then going back to Co-op 
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation 
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded 
Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing unnecessary language and bonus files 
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 5.6 to 2.8~3.4 GB, depending on selected components) 
Installation takes 6-10 minutes (depending on selected components) 
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly 
HDD space after installation: up to 10 GB 
Language can be changed in game settings 
Repack by FitGirl 

Minimum requirements: 

Operating System: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 
Processor: Core i3 3.2GHz or equal 
RAM: 4 GB 
Video Card: nVidia GTX 275 or AMD Radeon HD-7770 
DirectX: 9.0c 
HDD Space: up to 10 GB
